meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a nymphalid butterfly.
meanings.sent1: The colorful wings of the nymphalid butterfly caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The nymphalid butterfly gracefully fluttered from flower to flower.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous nymphalid butterfly played hide-and-seek with the flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as a nymphalid butterfly's wings.
meanings.sent5: The garden was alive with the beauty of the nymphalid butterfly.

meanings.definition: A butterfly of the family Nymphalidae.
meanings.sent1: I spotted a lovely nymphalid in the garden today.
meanings.sent2: The nymphalid rested on a leaf, soaking in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The curious child followed the nymphalid around the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her fluttering movements were as delicate as a nymphalid's.
meanings.sent5: The nymphalid's wings shimmered in the morning light.
